entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
